p:
For this anaylsis, we will estimate R t, and we can do this by applying the exponential growth method,
4 using data on the daily number of new COVID-19 cases, together with a recent estimate of the serial interval (mean = 4.7 days, standard deviation = 2.9 days),
5 at a 0.05 significance level, with the mathematical software R (v3.6.1.).
